name: Fernet Old Fashioned
description: Let's start the weekend right--with a cocktail recipe from Paul Clarke (The Cocktail Chronicles). Need more than one? Hit up the archives. Cheers! Ooh, really shouldn't have had that second slice of pie. And that last scoop of stuffing? What...

recipeInstructions.text: Combine ingredients in an old-fashioned glass and fill with ice. Give a light stir, then let the drink work its medicine.
